articles.title: Rudy Giuliani informed he is target of Georgia election investigation
articles.description: Giuliani was a huge proponent of Trump's claims of voter fraud in the 2020 election, which saw now-President Joe Biden defeat the ex-president.

articles.author: Brian Evans
articles.title: Dollar vs ruble: Russian currency sinks as 'friendly' states re-enter bonds
articles.description: The ruble dropped as much as 1.5% against the US dollar, while also pulling back roughly 0.2% against the euro.
articles.content:
The ruble sank early Monday as Russia allowed so-called "friendly" countries to re-enter Moscow's bond market.
Moscow's fiat currency fell as much as 1.5% to 61 against the US dollar, while also pul… [+1568 chars]

articles.content:

articles.description: Salman Rushdie's recovery is "headed in the right direction," his agent said, following a stabbing that reports say may be connected to the Iranian government.

articles.title: Photos: Norwegian officials euthanize Freya the walrus after she drew crowds
articles.description: Authorities in Norway euthanized a beloved local walrus called Freya after she became stressed by crowds who gathered to watch her sunbathe.
articles.content:
Norwegian authorities on Sunday took the sad step of euthanizing Freya, a beloved boat-sinking walrus, after crowds of fans gathered too close to watch her sunbathe in the Oslo fjord.

articles.description: Jamie Dimon told clients he estimated a 20% to 30% chance of a "harder recession" and a 20% to 30% chance of "something worse," Yahoo reported.
